Key Match Events: Jazz Chisholm Jr. hit a grand slam for the second consecutive game
Jazz Chisholm Jr. hit a home run (417 feet) in the 3rd inning
J.Bell singled to right, Fortes scored, Soler to second, Arraez to third in the 3rd inning
J. Soler homered to left (411 feet), Arraez scored in the 6th inning
J. Burger homered to left center (446 feet), Bell scored and Chisholm Jr. scored in the 7th inning
J. Ozuna homered to left (391 feet) in the 8th inning
N. Fortes homered to left (378 feet) in the 8th inning
J. Berti singled to left, Stallings scored, Gurriel to third in the 8th inning
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Marlins completed a three-game sweep of the NL East champions Braves
The game was played at loanDepot park in Miami, Florida, with an attendance of 22,051
The game was completed in 2:54 hours
Others: J. Luzardo pitched 6.0 IP, 4 H, 0 ER, 8 K, 2 BB to earn the win
C. Morton pitched 4.2 IP, 6 H, 6 ER, 5 K, 5 BB to earn the loss
